job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Computer Vision

paris berlin dubai mumbai singapore jakarta seoul and tokyoltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtour ltstronggttrust and safety engineering team ltstronggtis fast growing and responsible for building machine learning models and systems to identify and defend internet abuse and fraud on our platform our mission is to protect billions of users and publishers across the globe every day we embrace the stateoftheart machine learning technologies and scale them to detect and improve the tremendous amount of data generated on the platform with the continuous efforts from our team tiktok is able to provide the best user experience and bring joy to everyone in the worldltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwe are looking for excellent machine learning engineers who can take initiatives design and develop advanced machine learning solutions and deploy them directly to tiktoks global platform a successful candidate will have machine learning expertise and good software engineering experience and you detectors video understanding models multimodal classifiers etcltpgtltpgt work with engineering teams to implement model pipeline and deploy the service at scaleltpgtltpgt collaborate with product teams to define objectives and improve trust and safety strategyltpgtltpgt collaborate with data analysts to understand and find data patternsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt this opening is for both junior level and senior level minimum requirement is a bs degree with years industrial experience or a msphd degree with years relevant experienceltpgtltpgt hands on experience in one or more of the areas image classification object detection video understanding motion analysis or multimodal modelingltpgtltpgt good programming skills in python and similar languages and a deep understanding of data structures and algorithmsltpgtltpgt good communication and teamwork skills be passionate about learning new techniques and taking on challenging problemsltpgtltpgt experience in trust and safety andor publications in top conferences are plusltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttiktok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace at tiktok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy to achieve that goal we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach we believe individuals shouldnt be disadvantaged because of their background or identity but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience we are passionate about this and
